Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets will try to stop a four-game road skid when they play the Milwaukee Brewers.
The Brewers are ahead 4-0 in the season series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers are 46-33 in home games and 92-68 overall.
The Mets have the sixth-ranked team on-base percentage in the NL at.321.
William Contreras leads the Brewers with a.282 batting average, and has 37 doubles, two triples, 23 home runs, 77 walks and 92 RBI.
Jackson Chourio is 10-for-36 with two RBI over the past 10 games.
Francisco Lindor has 39 doubles, a triple, 31 home runs and 86 RBI for the Mets.
Francisco Alvarez is 7-for-30 with a double, four home runs and 10 RBI over the past 10 games.
Others: The pitching probable for the Mets is Jose Quintana (10-9, 3.74 ERA, 1.24 WHIP, 126 strikeouts) and for the Brewers is Jared Koenig (9-4, 2.51 ERA, 1.25 WHIP, 61 strikeouts).
